Motociclista derrapa para evitar arrollar a un peatón en Mazatlán
El accidente ocurre en la avenida Ejército Mexicano, en la colonia Ferrocarrilera
06 Nov 2019, 22:09 by Rubén Navarro
Mazatlán, Sinaloa.- El conductor de una motocicleta resultó lesionado al derrapar sobre la avenida Ejército Mexicano, esquina con la calle Jesús García, en la colonia Ferrocarrilera.
La causa del accidente fue por evitar arrollar a un joven que cruzaba la citada rúa sin tomar la debida precaución.




Según lo expuesto por el peatón ante la autoridad policial, escuchaba música con sus audífonos y no se percató de la presencia del motociclista.
El lesionado se identificó con el nombre de Oscar, y conducía una motocicleta Honda de reciente modelo tipo Shoper en color negro con vistas cromadas.
La unidad presentó daños en el manubrio y abolladura en el tanque de gasolina.
Paramédicos de Cruz Roja recibieron el reporte a las 21:00 horas aproximadamente. Al llegar al lugar de accidente se encontraron con una persona que presentaba probable fractura de mano izquierda.
Lo trasladaron a un hospital, tránsito se hizo cargo de la motocicleta.






Mazatlán

text:
Motorcyclist skidding to avoid hitting a pedestrian in Mazatlan
The accident occurs on the Mexican Army avenue, in the Ferrocarrilera neighborhood
06 Nov 2019, 22:09 by Rubén Navarro
Mazatlan, Sinaloa.- The driver of a motorcycle was injured by skidding on the Mexican Army Avenue, on the corner of Jesús García Street, in the Ferrocarrilera neighborhood.
The cause of the accident was to avoid running over a young man who crossed the said road without taking due precaution.




As stated by the pedestrian before the police authority, he listened to music with his headphones and did not notice the presence of the motorcyclist.
The injured was identified with the name of Oscar, and was driving a Honda motorcycle of recent model Shoper type in black with chrome views.
The unit showed damage to the handle and dent in the gas tank.
Red Cross paramedics received the report at approximately 9:00 p.m. Upon arriving at the accident site they found a person who had a probable left hand fracture.
He was transferred to a hospital, transit took care of the motorcycle.






Mazatlan


Accident
